title: URL Autocorrect
content: We have a split domain here and I have .dmz and .ent domains ie. nas1.ent, vpn.dnz and since the last update of firefox my URLS keep autocorrecting to nas1.net which does not resolve or worse resolves to an external server (my linux systems have star wars names which some .net's resolve to cybersquatter sites.) how do I disable this Feature, I have tried adding hosts to whitelist and to trusted sites
creator: bob.pcnet
